lines.text: Dad was a boxer in college!
I think he was wise to go into insurance.

[handing a prescription to Sue Forbes]
Take this up to the drug store.
How does it feel to be a decent, respectable married man?
Oh, your breakfast is on the table, darling.
You're not at all like the man who walked in here yesterday.
Well, from the way you described the man who walked in here yesterday, I'd say anything was an improvement.
Can't let women interfere with business, can we?
She probably doesn't appeal to you but for me, she's just what I told the doctor to order.
